assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Vaudoise Assurances Holding SA provides insurance products and services primarily in Switzerland. The company offers vehicle insurance, including car, motorcycle and scooter, oldtimer, motorhome, boat, bike, and traffic legal protection insurance; housing insurance comprising household and private liability, private building, building, golf, valuable object, private legal protection, and pet insurance; accident and sickness insurance; property protection, such as business inventory, technical equipment, commercial vehicle, and building insurance; business protection insurance, including corporate liability, operating loss, corporate legal protection, and transport insurance; and pensions and mortgages. It serves customers through its network of agencies. The company was founded in 1895 and is based in Lausanne, Switzerland. Vaudoise Assurances Holding SA operates as a subsidiary of Mutuelle Vaudoise, Société Coopérative.
